title: Sample Book, The Comprehensive Collection of Floral and Textured Wallpaper, 1950–69
title_raw: The Comprehensive Collection of Floral and Textured Wallpaper
creditline: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
description: Book contains a selection of floral and textured patters, including Aubussan, Belgian Stripe, Bijou, Blossoms, Brocade, Brussels, Celeste, Chiffon Rose, Chippendale, Citron, Cluny Damask, Elegante, Flora, Katabami, Kensington Stripe, Kimona, Kujaku, Nasturtium Bed, Peking Silk, Pomegranate, Poppy, Revelry, Rose Leaf, Sheraton Stripe, Silk Stripe, Thai Tex, Trieste, Venetian and Zinnia. Each design appears in multiple colorways. All have been given a protective vinyl coating.

participants.person_name: The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology

tombstone.epitaph: Sample Book, The Comprehensive Collection of Floral and Textured Wallpaper, 1950–69. screen printed and vinyl coated. Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology. 1998-75-187-1/123.
